2022 Highlights
• Newsweek’s Most Loved Workplaces: Ansys recognized on Newsweek’s list of most loved workplaces
• Newsweek’s Most Responsible Companies: Ansys recognized on Newsweek’s list of the 500 most responsible companies
• Great Place to Work: Ansys received multiple Great Place to Work awards spanning across our APAC and EMEA regions, with a Great

• Ansys received honorable mention for Fast Company’s World Changing Ideas award
• Ansys granted gold Stevie award for Simulation World
• Women of Color STEM: Ansys engineer named Technology Rising Star
• MUSE Awards: Ansys won platinum, gold, and silver awards for numerous marketing publications and campaigns
• As of 2022, Ansys received an MSCI ESG Rating of AA
